SvcCatalogItemAttribute.name: SvcCatalogItemAttribute
SvcCatalogItemAttribute.description: Represents pre-filled fulfillment flow inputs and user questions to ask to users in the context of a service catalog item version.

AttributeType.description: Type of the attribute used to determine if it's a pre-filled input or a questions to ask to users.

DataType.description: Type of the attribute value used into to render questions and validate data filled by users.

Description.description: Description of the service catalog item attribute.

DeveloperName.description: Unique name in the scope of a Service Catalog Item Version.

FieldIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the custom or standard field.

InputVariable.description: References the input variable in which the attribute value will be forwarded.

InputVariableValue.description: Attribute value defined by the catalog builder.

IsRequired.description: Indicates if the service catalog item attribute is required.

ItemVersionStatus.description: Specifies the status of the service catalog item version for which the attribute is defined.

Label.description: A label for the service catalog item attribute.

SortOrder.description: Sort order used to display questions in a specific order.

SvcCatalogItemDefId.description: The service catalog item definition for which the attribute is defined.
